en: Assuredly, that to which you invite me
in this world or in the Hereafter;
and indeed, our return is to Allah,
and indeed, the transgressors will be companions of the Fire.
And you will remember what I [now] say to you,
and I entrust my affair to Allah.
Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants."
So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted,
and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -
The Fire; they are exposed to it morning and evening.
And the Day the Hour appears
[it will be said], "Make the people of Pharaoh enter the severest punishment."
